change.item: sic and unclear moved outside elements pubplaces, publisher, composer, hofclass, key, opus
p. 1013 Christoph spelling corrected, also Kuhe

Tänze f. Violine. Heft 22, 23. Copenhagen, Lose u. D. à 10 Ngr.

div.bibl: Ambros, A.W., Op. 6. Trio f. Pfte, Violine u. Vclle. Prag, Christoph u. Kuhe 2 Rt. 20 Ngr.
